ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.util.timer
Class TimerEvent

java.lang.Object
  ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.util.timer.TimerEvent

public class TimerEvent
extends Object

Event representing a timer. TimerClients set timers using the timer thread and the timer thread returns expired timers (instances of this class) to requester.

Constructor Detail

TimerEvent

public TimerEvent(TimerClient client,
                  long milliseconds,
                  int type)
Constructs a new timer event with the specified client, delay in milliseconds and arbitrary (application defined) type.

Parameters:
client - The TimerClient that will be using this timer
milliseconds - The amount of time before this timer expires
type - An arbitrary type for this timer

TimerEvent

Constructs a new timer event with the specified client.

Parameters:
client - The TimerClient that will be using this timer
